title: Revenge......?
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Hey, hey, Karin-chan, I want to see how you walk ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Huh? Right now? I thought you had already mastered it when I first taught you how to do it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hmm, but I already forgot all of it. Pretty please!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I guess it canâ€™t be helped. Sure. Letâ€™s see......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I see, I see. I did remember one thing correctly. I donâ€™t put enough straightness into my spine, which makes it not look like Iâ€™m being suspended from above......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Whaaaat!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Youâ€™re always able to do it perfectly ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Nozomi-chan...... Iâ€™m gonna grade you strictly, you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
